about.TITLE: About the Debt Collection Tracker
about.DESCRIPTION: People who already had trouble paying their bills saw those troubles multiply during the Covid-19 pandemic. Although there were some moratoriums on debt collection, thousands of lawsuits were still being filed in a single county court per month. We have created the Debt Collection Lawsuit Tracker to monitor weekly updates to the number of debt cases being filed across the United States.

table.TITLE: An Overview of Debt Collection Lawsuits
table.DESCRIPTION: In the {{stateCount}} states and {{countyCount}} counties we track, the table shows an overview of debt collection lawsuits. View the report for individual states or counties to get a more detailed view, including charts and maps.

additional.DESCRIPTION:
